title: Police investigate accidental shooting off Automotive Drive
content:
COLORADO SPRINGS, Colo. (KKTV) - Colorado Springs Police are investigating a shooting that appears to be accidental.
The shooting happened just before 3:45 p.m. Thursday. Police originally received a call that someone was cut.
When police arrived on scene in the 700 block of Automotive Drive they discovered the victim had been shot. No foul play is suspected.
Police have the victim in custody. The person's condition wasn't available. It isn't clear if the unidentified individual will be facing any charges.
This is a developing story and if more information becomes available this article will be updated.
